title.narrative: General contributions to the OHCHR 2019-2022 incl. core contribution to the OHCHR, UN Voluntary Fund for Victims of Torture and UN Voluntary Fund for

description.narrative: General contributions to the OHCHR 2019-2022 incl. core contribution to the OHCHR, UN Voluntary Fund for Victims of Torture and UN Voluntary Fund for Technical Cooperation

title.narrative:
Sustainable human rights outcomes and the mainstreaming of human rights in the UN system.
Denmark's key priorities in 2019-2022 are: 1. Strengthened implementation of the outcomes of the Human Rights Council and other international human rights mechanisms. 2. Integration of human rights by states and the UN as they implement the SDGs and other development and poverty eradication efforts. 3. Effective implementation by businesses of the UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights. 4. Preventing violations and strengthening protection in situations of conflict and insecurity. 5. A stronger OHCHR focus on expanding civic space, emerging technologies, and women and young people. 6. Strengthening of OHCHR’s efficient and responsible use of resources.
